### Load R Packages


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
pacman::p_load(tidyverse, sf, tmap, ggstatsplot)
```
:::


::: :::

### Working with Master Plan Planning Sub-zone Data


#Master Plan 2014 
The code below imports shapefile

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz14_shp <- st_read(dsn = "data/",
                layer = "MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL' from data source 
  `C:\brigittatsai\ISSS626_AY2024-25_T1\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex01\data' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 323 features and 15 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 2667.538 ymin: 15748.72 xmax: 56396.44 ymax: 50256.33
Projected CRS: SVY21
```


:::
:::

to export to kml version (the original file is corrupted)

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
st_write(mpsz14_shp,
         "data/MP14_SUBZONE_WEB_PL.kml",
         delete_dsn = TRUE)
```
:::

* shp file is tidier than the kml version*

#Master Plan 2019 Subzone Boundary (No Sea)

Import the 2019 data
shp file

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz19_shp <- st_read(dsn = "data/",
                layer = "MPSZ-2019") %>%
  st_transform(crs = 3414) 
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `MPSZ-2019' from data source 
  `C:\brigittatsai\ISSS626_AY2024-25_T1\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex01\data' 
  using driver `ESRI Shapefile'
Simple feature collection with 332 features and 6 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6057 ymin: 1.158699 xmax: 104.0885 ymax: 1.470775
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::

::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
mpsz19_kml <- st_read("data/MasterPlan2019SubzoneBoundaryNoSeaKML.kml")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}

```
Reading layer `URA_MP19_SUBZONE_NO_SEA_PL' from data source 
  `C:\brigittatsai\ISSS626_AY2024-25_T1\In-class_Ex\In-class_Ex01\data\MasterPlan2019SubzoneBoundaryNoSeaKML.kml' 
  using driver `KML'
Simple feature collection with 332 features and 2 fields
Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON
Dimension:     XY, XYZ
Bounding box:  xmin: 103.6057 ymin: 1.158699 xmax: 104.0885 ymax: 1.470775
z_range:       zmin: 0 zmax: 0
Geodetic CRS:  WGS 84
```


:::
:::
